name: La Sportiva Maverink Rock Shoes - Youths
description: A crazy-soft performance slipper for young climbers who are developing strength and skills. Comfortable un-lined leather accommodes growing feet and has a forgiving fit and an almost barefoot feel. No-Edge® technology make it extremely sensitive and ideal for bouldering, sending steep faces and overhanging routes.Unlined leather and synthetic upper.No laces to fuss with.P3® (Permanent Power Platform) ensures a downturned yet flexible shape for steep lines or featureless vert.Three pull loops make slipping shoes on and off easier.No-Edge design for maximum edging power right out of the box.Sole is super-sticky 3mm thick Vibram XS Grip 2® rubber.La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size.
